CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "Open") , IMAGE("/resource/AllegationStatus/Open32.png", "Open"),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "Pending Approval") , IMAGE("/resource/AllegationStatus/Pending32.png", "Pending Approval"),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "Closed") , IMAGE("/resource/AllegationStatus/Closed32.png", "Closed"),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "Civil") , IMAGE("/resource/AllegationStatus/Civil32.png", "Civil"),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "Founded") , IMAGE("/resource/AllegationStatus/Founded32.png", "Founded"),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "Prosecuted") , IMAGE("/resource/AllegationStatus/Prosecuted32.png", "Prosecuted"),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "Unfounded") , IMAGE("/resource/AllegationStatus/Unfounded32.png", "Unfounded"),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Null"), null,null))))))))
CustomField.label: Status Indicator
